snippet: The case of Sahar Gul, a teen-ager confined and abused by her husband and his family, has become a test of whether Afghanistan is starting to take women's rights seriously.
abstract: The case of Sahar Gul, a teen-ager confined and abused by her husband and his family, has become a test of whether Afghanistan is starting to take women's rights seriously.
lead_paragraph: I went to find Sahar Gul.

headline.main: In One Girl's Story, a Test of Women's Rights in Afghanistan
